dialog.speaker: Berthold Fox (Male)
dialog.utterance: Hey, Mantiqueen Slayer. Glad you made it in one piece. After all, not everyone's so lucky.

dialog.speaker: Berthold Fox (Male)
dialog.utterance: Meet my Corporate Compliance Crew. Then check out our weapons locker inside. I reckon you'll find something you like.

dialog.speaker: Berthold Fox (Male)
dialog.utterance: Then we call it even between us.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Kind of odd for a group of mercs to label themselves as a corporate entity.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll keep an eye out for that.

dialog.speaker: Berthold Fox (Male)
dialog.utterance: The corporate model is the oldest and most efficient, not to mention stable, structure history has ever shown us. Plus, corporations got certain rights not entailed to individuals.

dialog.speaker: Berthold Fox (Male)
dialog.utterance: I lead the C3s. Addie covers our payroll and expenditures. Lance handles the human capital, and Donald is our charming public face.

dialog.speaker: Berthold Fox (Male)
dialog.utterance: Our system works - we've racked up more confirmed kills than any other crew you can hire.
